snippet: The selections include chocolate truffles with rye whiskey, Scotch, bourbon or chocolate stout ganache inside.
abstract: Vosges Haut-Chocolat has come up with a gift for Dad that puts booze in the bonbons; company has packed an assortment in a handsome vintage-style cigar box.
lead_paragraph: The selections include chocolate truffles with rye whiskey, Scotch, bourbon or chocolate stout ganache inside.

headline.seo: Vosges Chocolates With Liquor for Dad - Food Stuff
headline.main: Sweet and Spirited, Chocolates for Dad
headline.print_headline: Sweet and Spirited, Chocolates for Dad
